name: DROWNING PUZZLE
description: "Drowning puzzle"  is a 2D single player puzzle game which focuses on spreading awareness about safety standards related with water. It aims at making individual to brainstorm about solving and enjoying the output image it generates. The image forms contains slogan for providing awareness about water i.e. of sea, river or pond and threat it caries for the children and untrained adults. This a fun game to play  along with inducing a problem solving approach in oneself.
